articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Estranged husband of missing Connecticut mom arrested, charged with murder
articles.content:
Fotis Dulos, the estranged husband of missing Connecticut mom Jennifer Dulos, has been arrested and charged with murder.
This is a developing story.

articles.author: Emily DeCiccio
articles.title: Iranian cyberattacks could cause 'real damage,' warns cybersecurity expert
articles.description: Cybersecurity expert Justin Cappos warns that Iran has already “proven it’s both adept at launching cyberattacks and that those attacks can cause real damage” in the wake of the death of General Qassem Soleimani in a U.S. drone strike.
articles.content:
Cybersecurity expert Justin Cappos warns that Iran has already “proven it’s both adept at launching cyberattacks and that those attacks can cause real damage” in the wake of the death of Gen. Qassem Soleimani in a U.S. drone strike.

articles.author: Ronn Blitzer
articles.title: Pompeo rejects claim of Soleimani diplomatic mission as 'propaganda'
articles.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo scoffed Tuesday at a suggestion that Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani was on a diplomatic mission to Baghdad when a U.S. drone strike killed him, insisting that the story is "fundamentally false" and "propaganda."
articles.content:

articles.author: Janine Puhak
articles.title: Rome bans souvenir stands from Pantheon, Colosseum, other historic sites
articles.description: Looks like we'll have to go trinket shopping elsewhere.
articles.content:
Looks like we'll have to go trinket-shopping elsewhere.
Roman leaders have officially banned souvenir stands and snack bars at historic attractions, including the Colosseum, Pantheon, Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps. The small, mobile shops have been forbid… [+1755 chars]

articles.author: Travis Fedschun
articles.title: American family attacked on highway in Mexico says 'bullets were everywhere' in deadly rampage
articles.description: A family from Oklahoma who was returning to the U.S. after visiting relatives in Mexico when they were attacked by gunmen on a sparsely traveled stretch of highway near the Texas border said Monday that "bullets were everywhere" during the chase.
articles.content:
A family from Oklahoma, returning to the U.S. after visiting relatives in Mexico, was attacked by gunmen, and one relative says "bullets were everywhere" during the fatal incident in the sparsely traveled Texas border area.
Oscar Castillo López, 13, was kill… [+4608 chars]

articles.title: New York Giants to hire Joe Judge as their next coach: reports
articles.description: The New York Giants are reportedly set to hire New England Patriots wide receivers and special teams coach Joe Judge as their next head coach.
articles.content:
The New York Giants are reportedly set to hire New England Patriots wide receivers and special teams coach Joe Judge as their next head coach.

articles.author: Alexandria Hein
articles.title: Boy, 11, dies during Make-A-Wish trip to Mall of America
articles.description: The boy spent his final days with family visiting The LEGO store and taking flight on FlyOver America.
articles.content:
A Wisconsin family is mourning the loss of their 11-year-old son who died of terminal brain cancer last week while on a Make-A-Wish trip to the Mall of America.
Michael “Mikey” Choroszy had been in remission for just two months in September when doctors told… [+1639 chars]

articles.author: Alexandria Hein
articles.title: Girl may lose fingers after shoveling snow for hours in frigid temperatures, report says
articles.description: The girl was allegedly shoveling for several hours without gloves when she told her teacher that her hands felt numb.
articles.content: A 13-year-old girl in China is facing possible amputation of multiple fingers after she was allegedly forced to shovel snow for hours in frigid temperature by her school. Lu Yanyan, who allegedly shoveled for hours on Dec. 31 without any gloves, now has swoll… [+1631 chars]

articles.content:
New year, new menu.
Chick-fil-A has recently announced that it will be taking certain items off its menu in select markets to make room for other, spicier selections.

articles.title: Sens. Braun, Daines: Speaker Pelosi, send impeachment articles to Senate in 25 days or end this partisan game
articles.description: In the real world, it’s put up or shut up. Here's why we joined Senator Hawley in introducing a mandate that forces the House to deliver the articles of impeachment within 25 days.

articles.title: Larry Elder: Booker pushing evidence-free 'conspiracy theory' about Stacey Abrams' loss
articles.description: Radio Host Larry Elder on Tuesday laid out facts that shows that failed Georgia Gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams had lost the election fairly, pushing back on criticism that her loss was due to lack of election integrity.
